skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dreaming meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dreaming Meditation is the Alexa skill that lets you experience guided meditations whenever you need them. With over 10 sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and offering a variety of voices and soothing background sounds, this skill is designed to help both your body and mind drift into a state of deep relaxation.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Meditations led by different professional voices
• A range of background sounds perfect for meditation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated meditation paths
• Access to all session lengths

We’d love your feedback to help us continue improving and provide the ultimate guided meditation experience.

Enjoy your journey into relaxation!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
